title: This year's program
description: We are looking forward to a great day with exciting events and activities!
summerjob_marathon_desc: Summer Job Marathon is a two-minute pitch event where Kjemidagen participants showcase their summer job and internship opportunities. It's a popular event with positive feedback from both companies and students.
job_marathon_desc: Job marathon is a similar event to summer job marathon, but instead of summer jobs, participating companies are given the opportunity to briefly present their graduate programs, trainee positions, internships, master's theses, PhD positions, and full-time positions.
banquet_desc: In the evening, a banquet will be arranged with company representatives and 4th and 5th year students. The banquet is an important part of Kjemidagen, and a great opportunity for companies to get to know our students better.
cv_photo_desc: Get a professional CV photo taken at Kjemidagen!
mingle_desc: Networking is an important part of Kjemidagen, and a great opportunity for companies to get to know our students better.
